returns.askFee: Fee when AMM sells X (WAD precision, e.g., 30e14 = 30bps)
returns.bidFee: Fee when AMM buys X (WAD precision, e.g., 30e14 = 30bps)

returns.askFee: Updated fee when AMM sells X (WAD precision)
returns.bidFee: Updated fee when AMM buys X (WAD precision)

getFeeStructure((bool,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Strategies that override supportsFeeStructure() to return true MUST also override thisThis should never be called if supportsFeeStructure() returns false

returns._0: Empty fee structure (never reached due to revert)

supportsFeeStructure().details: Override and return true in strategies that implement getFeeStructure()

returns._0: False by default for backward compatibility with constant-fee strategies

afterInitialize(uint256,uint256).notice: Initialize the strategy with starting reserves

afterSwap((bool,uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Called after each trade to update fees

getName().notice: Get the strategy name for display

slots(uint256).notice: Fixed storage array - strategies can only use these 32 slots

supportsFeeStructure().notice: Default implementation: strategy does not support fee tiers
